item.title: 'mRpostman' - IMAP Tools for R in a Tidy Way
item.description: mRpostman - IMAP Tools for R in a Tidy Way mRpostman is an R package to help you to easy connect to your IMAP (Internet Message Access Protocol) server and execute commands, such as listing mailboxes, fetching and searching for messages in a tidy way. It heavily relies on {curl} for issuing the IMAP commands. So far, mRpostman have been tested with Gmail, Yahoo Mail and AOL Mail, but it should also work with other mail providers.

item.title: Announcing the new 'emstreeR' package
item.description: Announcing the new ‘emstreeR’ package (2020’s {ggmap} update) I am proud to announce emstreeR - my first R package available on CRAN. emstreeR is a package for fast and easily computing Euclidean Minimum Spanning Trees (EMST). It heavily relies on RcppMLPACK and Rcpp to work as wrapper to the EMST Dual-Tree Boruvka algorithm (March, Ram, Gray, 2010)1 implemented in ‘mlpack’ - the C++ Machine Learning library (Curtin et al.
